tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE media_regulator_complaints (
  complaint_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  media_title VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
  media_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  complaint_text TEXT NOT NULL,
  complaint_date TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
  status VARCHAR(20) DEFAULT 'Pending'
)

CREATE TABLE Media_Complaints (
    complaint_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    media_title VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    complaint_description TEXT,
    complainant_name VARCHAR(100),
    complaint_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE Media_Regulators (
    regulator_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    regulator_name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    regulator_email VARCHAR(255),
    regulator_phone VARCHAR(20),
    regulator_address TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE Media_Complaints (
  complaint_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  media_type VARCHAR(255),
  complaint_text TEXT,
  complaint_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE Media_Users (
  user_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  user_name VARCHAR(255),
  user_email VARCHAR(255)
)

CREATE TABLE Media_Regulators (
  regulator_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  regulator_name VARCHAR(255),
  regulator_contact VARCHAR(255)
)

CREATE TABLE Media_Regulator_Complaints (
    complaint_id INTEGER PRIMARY KEY,
    content_id INTEGER,
    complaint_category VARCHAR(255),
    complaint_description TEXT,
    complaint_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE Media_Content (
    content_id INTEGER PRIMARY KEY,
    content_name VARCHAR(255),
    media_type VARCHAR(50),
    release_date DATE,
    content_rating VARCHAR(10)
)

CREATE TABLE Media_Regulators (
    regulator_id INTEGER PRIMARY KEY,
    regulator_name VARCHAR(255),
    regulator_email VARCHAR(255),
    regulator_phone VARCHAR(20)
)

CREATE TABLE Media_Complaint_Responses (
    response_id INTEGER PRIMARY KEY,
    complaint_id INTEGER,
    response_text TEXT,
    response_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE Media_Regulator_Contacts (
    contact_id INTEGER PRIMARY KEY,
    regulator_id INTEGER,
    contact_name VARCHAR(255),
    contact_email VARCHAR(255),
    contact_phone VARCHAR(20)
)
